mapper.select: select m.member_name, n.notification_created_at, a.apply_result, r.company_id,r.recruit_detail,r.recruit_title, s.company_id, s.suggest_id from notification_tb as n join apply_tb as a on a.apply_id = n.apply_id join recruit_tb as r on r.recruit_id = a.recruit_id join suggest_tb as s on n.suggest_id = s.suggest_id join member_tb as m on m.member_id = n.member_id where n.member_id = #{memberId};

select m.member_name, n.notification_created_at, a.apply_result, r.company_id,r.recruit_detail,r.recruit_title, s.company_id, s.suggest_id from notification_tb as n join apply_tb as a on a.apply_id = n.apply_id join recruit_tb as r on r.recruit_id = a.recruit_id join suggest_tb as s on n.suggest_id = s.suggest_id join member_tb as m on m.member_id = n.member_id where notification_id = #{notificationId}
